entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as one of the four houses at the magic school, described as having friends like Gryffindor.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as one of the four houses at the magic school, described as having friends like Slytherin.

entities.name: huffepuff
entities.description: Huffepuff is mentioned as one of the four houses at the magic school, described as being paired with Ravenclaw.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: Ravenclaw is mentioned as one of the four houses at the magic school, described as being paired with Huffepuff.

relationships.description: Slytherin and Gryffindor are described as having friends like each other.
Huffepuff and Ravenclaw are described as being paired together.
